content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For those who have been following my journey, I really wanted some kind of forum to share the intimate details of my experience. Pictures on Instagram and Facebook can't express the amount of conflicting, and at times overwhelming, array of emotions I've experienced since moving to Japan. I've never been happier in my life, and I've never felt lonelier at times. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It's been over 6 months days since I left the US. It's the longest time I've ever gone without seeing my family or friends. And definitely the longest time I've gone without eating Jersey Mikes. Within the last 150 days I've learned (some of) a new language, made so many wonderful friends, built a new little place I call home, began a new career, started dating, and fell in love with a different culture. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"So, welcome to the start of my blog. Thank you for the check-ins, the texts, the calls, the cards and packages - the love. I have been so wrapped in love and I'm deeply grateful for it. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart. And please, enjoy my ramblings.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
